title: A collaborative research by IIT Bhilai and NERIST reveals groundbreaking findings on Phyllostachys bambusoides (Bije bamboo), a rare species from Ziro Valley, Arunachal Pradesh.
The Techneck issue, characterized by discomfort and muscular strain from prolonged device use in poor postures, has been tackled by our group.
